website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for warm-weather wear and easy hikes, but the socks might not be enough for serious hiking.
pros: Socks have cushioning for lightweight, comfortable wear
Smartwool technology and mesh area keep feet cool and dry
cons: Not as durable as some other options, especially when worn on long hikes in rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: No Itch, But Pills Heavily
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of modern wool for its ability to breath and wick moisture, even in hot weather, so I wear different weights of wool socks year round. I'm also a big fan of many Smart Wool products for these reasons and that their products don't itch, which is why I gave these socks a try. These socks are comfortable, well made, and don't itch. However, they do pill heavily, especially at the heel. This is a weave problem, not a problem with wool itself, since other similar wool socks I've tried from Darn Tough and Duluth Trading do not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sole and Top are Different Thicknesses
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socks and very comfortable. I gave them four stars because the top of the sock is thinner than the sole, which feels weird to me. If you think this might be a problem for you, I would recommend the 'Smartwool Men's PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks' which have a uniform thickness that is about the same as the sole of these 'Hike Ultra Light's.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for any activity where you don’t want de sweaty feet or blister
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Have had many pairs of these in the past. Cushioned feeling without excess thickness. They keep you feet dry from sweat or wet shoes. No blisters in unlined leather boots is another great use. They also dry out very quickly even if they are soaked. Worth the investment as they are really durable also. One note, if you want them to fit tight, like for running or basketball you should order the size meant for a slightly smaller shoe size than you actually wear. Otherwise you can feel a very slight “slip” under your forefoot as the fibers fold over when you push off. This is why they give you such a cushioned feel despite the thin material.
customer_reviews.author: LXXV

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with this particular model of Smartwool sock
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and have worn them consistently for about two years, rotating between five or six pairs. I have been very happy with this particular model of Smartwool sock. Great in the winter as your feet stay warm and great during the summer since your feet do not get sweaty like they do with cotton socks. These are great socks.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Prevent blisters
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't worn wool socks before, I recommend these, even in very hot weather. In fact, especially in hot weather. It wicks moisture away, assuming your shoes breathe, and keeps skin from getting water-logged like what happened to me with cotton socks and helped cause a bad blister to form. I will never hike without wool socks again (at least never with cotton).
customer_reviews.author: Dog Breath

customer_reviews.title: Darn good socks
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone pay this much for a pair of socks? Several reasons: they feel so darn good! Both slipping on and in your shoe they’re a pleasure; the feel on your feet is great even after walking for miles; although these have an insulating quality for cold weather they also wick moisture and feel great in hot weather; these socks remain fresh and odorless even after a few uses. Honest!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah X

customer_reviews.title: SmartWool is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn SmartWool socks for nearly 10-years and left cotton socks behind! Since I began wearing SmartWool, I have eliminated stinky, smelly, sweaty feet and shoes. Wool allows my feet to breathe and does not absorb sweat or funk as cotton does. Even in summer, my feet feel great! Try them, you'll be surprised how much better your feet feel. Oh! They have a great guarantee too!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: SmartWool Socks, A Step Above
customer_reviews.text: These are my favs. I wish I could describe how these are different from the poly-acrylic socks. These don't have the soft & bloated & bulky feel of acrylics. They do have extra bulk around the toe and heel and they are thinner on the top. The SmartWool socks protected the spot where I had the blister last week; during my run I completely forgot it was there. I can't believe I'm so impressed by a pair of socks!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn't do these socks justice!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of khaki or tan color socks to coordinate with my clothes. This socks are perfect to wear with the ankle height light hikers for which I purchased them for. While the sock have a slight yellow overtones, they are more tan, Oatmeal definitely describes the color. The footbed of the sock is surprisingly soft.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne B

customer_reviews.title: Close enought to erfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: These were a better fit for me than the other top choices. I wear a 14EE. The socks say they fit 13 - 15. After you wash them they are more like a 12- 14, but with wide feet they are a bit snug. The materials is excellent and so is the craftsmanship. Even though they are a bit tight I still like they way they feel. I just know they toe will wear out soon. I would buy them again if I am unable to find a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight summer hiking socks.
customer_reviews.text: I own two other SmartWool "hunting" versions with more padding. One is a thick one I use for winter, and another that's thinner for Spring/Autumn. I needed something for summer. Thus....lightweight, not super warm, and low-cut for maximum breathability. And, like all of Smartwool's socks I've used.....excellent quality. Oh, and NOT ITCHY!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for a hiking trip but now I use them for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: These Socks fit so well. Merino wool is amazing. It is always breathable but does such a great job at keeping your feet warm. I bought these to use for hiking in Iceland and my feet were never cold. This is the kind of quality you would expect from SmartWool. I even wore these during the summer in the factory I work in. they provide really nice cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Laundry Matt

customer_reviews.title: These are Ultra Light & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: SmartWool and Darn Tough socks are my favorite for trekking and around town. This style of SmartWool Hike Ultra Light Mini socks are in fact thin but still feel substantial. They fit well in my HiTec cross trainers and my Vivobarefoot Gobi II Desert Boots. The wool is not as soft as my hike/trek Darn Tough socks but are a good choice for warmer weather trekking or running.
customer_reviews.author: Rocannon MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Worn Out After One Year
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs of these socks and rotate them with others in use. I have generally been pleased with the product until now. After only one year, a pair has apparently worn thin at the heal and cannot be further worn. For the price of a pair, the quality should have held up longer than twelve months. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nomdeplume

customer_reviews.title: My feet are sheep now
customer_reviews.text: I strictly wear wool socks and my first time wearing these my feet transformed into a fluffy sheep. These are the most comfortable socks I've ever worn. I hope they hold up after many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I think I have like every Smartwool product I have tired... and I have tried many of them. These have all of the great features of wool (cool in the summer, warm in the winter, don't smell, dry fast). I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, far from Ultra Light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a first layer sock, hoping for ultra light thinness. These are fairly heavy socks, but they are comfortable and durable. I already have several pairs. At a minimum, they are medium weight socks.
customer_reviews.author: Coug

customer_reviews.title: Get loose over time
customer_reviews.text: I have had these socks for almost a year now and I am disappointed in how they are holding up. I love smartwool socks and have had several pairs over the years and currently have other styles. However all 4 pairs I have in this style are pilling and not keeping a snug form on my feet like all the others. I always hang dry my socks and never stretch and tuck them into each other, I just stack them in the drawer so I don't think user care is the problem. This style just doesn't hold up to usual standards.
customer_reviews.author: Z Ford

customer_reviews.title: SmartWool is not the same
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying SmartWool sox for many years. They are not what they used to be. They shrink even when washing in cold water and air drying. They pill up after a short time. Not worth the extra money anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rich O

customer_reviews.title: Love my Smartwool products!
customer_reviews.text: I love Smartwool products. These do not disappoint. They are just the right thickness and keep my feet very warm in the cold weather but are not too hot in the warmer weather. I wear these for hiking, working around the house, and everyday wear as well. I purchased more in different colors and styles!
customer_reviews.author: R Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Comfort and Cool
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for hiking and working outdoors in hot and humid weather. I am on my feet and moving all day and comfort is high on my list. Quality is next highest and these socks are the very best I have found. Try a pair and you will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Solid sock.
customer_reviews.text: These make good cold out hot weather sock... Why? The keep your feet dry. Dry is warm and dry is cool. I work construction with muddy boots in the heat and cold. These are also good with any light hiker shoes. Recently in new Mexico when soaked by a afternoon rain my feet were confortable even soaking wet. Dries fast
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: When it’s not too cold but your feet are
customer_reviews.text: Great insulation for those colder days. Ankle is a little short but otherwise great buy
customer_reviews.author: Red Fan

customer_reviews.title: Might run small
customer_reviews.text: i really like smartwool socks. The brick and mortar stores don't carry the assortment/styles that Amazon offers. I'd rate it a five if it fit comfortably, I wear in womens 10.5, purchased the large, should have selected extra large. My other SmartWools, from brick and mortar fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD NOT GREAT
customer_reviews.text: They are a little thick for my taste, unlike the last pairs of smartwool's I bought. I don't know why they call them Ultra Light. I own other smartwool socks and they ARE ultra light.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more comfort but I could easily feel the seams. Glad I ordered only one pair. Moving on...
customer_reviews.author: Stan10

customer_reviews.title: Dry comfort
customer_reviews.text: Best socks I have ever worn. When my feet get hot, I get irritable. Even the ultra lights are a little warm for me, but the comfort and dryness more than make up for it. You definitely pay for what you get. They run on the high side, but you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking socks
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking socks! Very comfy and durable. Fast drying and soft, even after a few days wear in a row. I've bought a few pairs after my first set. Just make you they don't get put in the dryer!!! They WILL shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Doogie

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: These are my racing socks for most of my races. Durability is why I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Rightwing Patriot

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm, very durable, and yet breathable socks that I wear daily and they have lasted me several years and counting...These are the only socks that i buy currently. I only wish they offered these socks in navy blue, and orange.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: The ankle sock to end all ankle socks
customer_reviews.text: There is no chance i will ever buy another brand's ankle sock again. No chance. I may not even need to buy this brand's sock again. That's how good they are. I'm wearing them now.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable otherwise. They would make great work day socks
customer_reviews.text: Light, breathable, but they don't quite seem to protect the lateral aspects of the foot well. It lacks padding in these areas and focuses mainly on the soles and heels. Not really for backpacking unless you tend to have feet that never blister or you are not carrying a lot of weight. Very comfortable otherwise. They would make great work day socks.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: The only socks both me and my husband wear. They are perfect for walking both in summer and winter. My podiatrist recommended them and I’m so glad he did.
customer_reviews.author: Chathamgirl

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: the wool blend makes for feet that are cool in the summer and warm in the winter . I wear a size 12 M shoe and the XL that i ordered is a little big .
customer_reviews.author: pirate steve

customer_reviews.title: These are nice lighter socks for spring or fall
customer_reviews.text: These are nice lighter socks for spring or fall. I am a female with 9.5 shoe size and ordered the large. Fits nicely. I could probably have gone with a medium, however my feet are wide, so I'm happy with a little extra room.
customer_reviews.author: liz d

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, not worth the weight saving.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin to be used as a hiking sock. I only hiked 6 miles but had several blisters. Thicker socks haven't left me with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: BooYaa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Socks & Last Forever
customer_reviews.text: My most expensive pair of my favorite best fitting socks I own... ... love these and have bought this brand before. Last for years. Great fitting
customer_reviews.author: RIchard .old man

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best socks I've ever found.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are padded but still not very thick at all. They are cool and comfortable in hot weather, just high enough to stay put and not slide down under the heel, and odor-free. I plan to get several more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Great sock. Sized down in anticipation of stretch. I wear 11M in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Okie

customer_reviews.title: Bought two more pair.
customer_reviews.text: I got one pair, after a friend insisted that I would like them. I have to work an hour or two inside with no time to change shoes and socks before going out in the cold. My feet were always cold, before I got these socks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pirtle

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks, don't waste your money on cheap socks get this brand they don't fall apart and last a really long time..
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Comfortable and keep you feet warm. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of SmartWool socks. I was looking for something in wool with a little bit of cushioning that also was durable. So far, so good. I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Luebker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well in all but the most extreme wet weather situations. Care instructions are a bit onerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with Smart Wool. Loved 'em. These were a great value and very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting and comfortable sock
customer_reviews.text: A very nice pair of socks that fit well. They were a noticeable improvement over an old worn out pair of the same sock.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. I had a pair like these that latest for many years.

customer_reviews.title: Summer and Winter, best wool socks out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. These things last a long time. Not just for winter, either. I use these while in Sub Sahara Africa, too.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This feel nice and thick and are true to size

customer_reviews.title: Awesome socks!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these socks! It's literally the best pair I own. Would highly recommend.. even though they are a little pricey, they are definitely worth it!

customer_reviews.title: I still like my long smarwools socks though
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Probably not worth the money. I still like my long smarwools socks though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For someone with small feet (probably less than a 6-7 in men's) a small size pair fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great warm socks!
customer_reviews.text: Needed more Smartwool socks, still have my Smartwool socks from years ago! These are great, warm and not bulky. I have been looking for these, they are close to the original Smartwool socks.

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I use them for my everyday socks and have several pairs. They tend to be on the expensive side but as my wife says, don't skimp on your feet as they will carry you through life.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think the quality was as good as other smart wool products I’ve owned, after one wash fabric already started to pill.

customer_reviews.title: but still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A bit thicker than i thought they would be, but still very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Seem to have been modified since last ones we bought. Looked the same online, don't feel like wool and Way way to thin. We will not buy again!!

customer_reviews.title: Best sock there is
customer_reviews.text: Never smells, extremely cool and comfortable. Amazing for hiking or everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another Great Product from Smartwool. My goto company for socks.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight socks

customer_reviews.title: Yes, a great sock.
customer_reviews.text: Do I feel a little guilty spending this much on socks, probably, but they are pretty fantastic socks. Just try them out already.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for my husband to wear to work. He is on his feet and moving, not just a lot of standing, all day and was wearing holes in other expensive, thick-soled socks. He is loving these. They keep his feet warm and dry, and we haven't seen any holes yet! I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: rmbrasher

customer_reviews.title: Great Scott! Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a couple pairs of these socks and they are the best. Not only do they last a long time because they are well made, the logo is at the bottom of the sock, unlike a particular sporting goods company who shall remain nameless who always puts the logo on the top of the sock so it shows it if you wear it with certain styles of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great summer sock
customer_reviews.text: After six weeks I can say that these ultra light hikers are the most comfortable summer socks that I own. They do not shift under a fast pace and keep my feet dry. They still look great after several washings.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not my first pair...
customer_reviews.text: Won't be my last. I'm very happy with Smartwool socks, and often toss a pair in if I'm trying to get my order total to qualify for free shipping.

customer_reviews.title: good sock

customer_reviews.text: I really like smartwool socks and these are just right for the hot summer. Love 'em.

customer_reviews.title: Still quite cushioned on the sole- more than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Still quite cushioned on the sole- more than I expected for an ultra light hiking sock. Still I will get lots of use out of this pair!

customer_reviews.text: They give my feet support beside wearing my arches, spendy but worth it.

customer_reviews.text: great product! I wear them outdoors in hot and cold weather and am equally comfortable in all conditions.

customer_reviews.title: Does it get any better?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these socks to try alongside some other brands. These arrived first and I never even had to try the others. I can say beyond a shadow of a doubt that this is the most comfortable my feet have ever been. After purchasing these socks you will want to throw away all your cotton ones.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Again

customer_reviews.text: I only wear SmartWool Socks, whether dress, or sport, or hiking, or casual. They never wear out or through. Best socks I have ever bought.

customer_reviews.text: Ultra Light...NOT! Comfortable enough, but I'll never wear them here in Texas!

customer_reviews.text: Great durability with minimal pilling, even after many washes. Thick and light. Worth the price.

product_meta.title: Smartwool Unisex Hike Ultra Light Mini
feature_bullets: WARM INSULATION: Experience durability at its peak with the Smartwool Men’s PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks. These socks are built for performance in the highest degree, making them ready for any adventure on your list.

COMFORTABLE FIT: The Men’s PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks feature a 4 Degree Elite Fit System for a dialed, performance-oriented fit with a flex zone at the ankle joint and Virtually Seamless toe for enhanced comfort.

DURABLE YET BREATHABLE: The Men’s PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks are designed with Indestructawool technology for exceptional durability and comfort. The body-mapped mesh zones featured on these socks offer added breathability for all-day wear.

LIGHT CUSHION: The lightly cushioned bottom on the Men’s PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks allows you to wear these performance socks on various trails and road terrains without discomfort. Whether you are biking, running, skiing, or hiking, these socks will provide you with padded comfort during any season.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Comprised of 69% Merino Wool, 29% Nylon, 1% Polyester and 1% Elastane, the Men’s PhD Outdoor Light Mini Socks should be machine washed inside out in warm water and tumble dried on low. These socks should not be bleached, ironed, or dry cleaned.
